title: Associate Revenue Manager for Short Term Rentals
job_overview:
About RevTopia
We optimize short-term rental revenue for property managers with 10+ listings. We use data, automation, and market insights to drive growth.

Role Overview
You’ll support our senior revenue team. You’ll monitor performance, analyze data, and suggest pricing moves. You’ll learn advanced revenue-management tools and grow into a fully independent revenue manager.

Key Responsibilities

- Pull daily and weekly pacing reports.
- Update pricing profiles in PriceLabs and native platforms (Airbnb, VRBO).
- Create and analyze competitive comp sets and market trends.
- Flag at-risk dates and propose manual overrides.
- Prepare simple Excel/Google Sheets dashboards.
- Track conversion metrics and occupancy shifts.
- Document pricing decisions and ROI impact.
- Communicate with operations to implement minimum-stay and rate changes.
- Assist in client calls by summarizing data insights.

Must-Have Qualifications

- 1–2 years experience in hospitality analytics or revenue support.
- Strong Excel or Google Sheets skills (pivot tables, formulas).
- Basic understanding of short-term rental platforms (Airbnb, VRBO).
- Clear, concise written and verbal communication.
- Detail-oriented and deadline-driven.
- Comfortable with repetitive data pulls and updates.
- Familiarity with PriceLabs

Nice-to-Have
- Experience with Google Looker Studio.
- Basic SQL or database-query knowledge.
- Exposure to Slack and Zapier workflows.

What We Offer
- Starting salary $3/hr
- Growth path to full Revenue Manager role.
- Mentorship in advanced pricing strategies.
- Performance based salary increases every 90 days


-Send an email directly to Upgrade to see actual info with the subject line: Big Daddy Warbucks
- Once you send an email, you will receive a reply froUpgrade to see actual info with a google form. The form will ask your age. To show that you are paying attention, enter your age as "40"
